title: This Designer Turned A Year's Worth Of Emotions Into Colorful Spectrums
text:
This Designer Turned A Year's Worth Of Emotions Into Colorful Spectrums 
Published By: Fastcompany.com - Today 
Portuguese designer Giestas has created a trilogy of books that visualize a year of his emotions as rainbows of feelings.Even after years of...
